parameters.query: SELECT p.id, p.sku, p.product_name, p.english_title, p.supplier_url, p.listing_price, p.total_cost, p.profit_margin, p.profit_usd, p.images, p.image_url, p.weight_g, p.hts_code, p.origin_country, p.ai_confidence_score, p.workflow_status, p.audit_status, p.user_id, i.physical_quantity FROM products_master p LEFT JOIN inventory_master i ON i.product_master_id = p.id AND i.user_id = p.user_id WHERE p.user_id = $1 AND (p.workflow_status IN ('draft', 'ready', 'approved')) AND ($2::text[] IS NULL OR $2::text[] = '{}' OR p.id::text = ANY($2::text[])) ORDER BY p.updated_at DESC LIMIT $3

parameters.query: UPDATE products_master SET audit_status = $1::jsonb, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = $2 AND user_id = $3
